Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel

Class ModelObserver

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.ModelObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChatViewController, CreateLobbyController, EndGameController, JoinLobbyController, MenuViewController, PlayingBoardController, SelectObjectiveController, SelectStarterCardController, TuiPrinter, WaitingRoomController
public abstract class ModelObserver extends Object
Class to create an Observer-Observable Pattern. This is triggered the update in the view depending on the method called in the model.
